title: S10E013 – "Things Get Worse" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
Tonight's featured author: Chisto Healy. Otis presents two stories of situations that can't get any worse...until they do. In the first, a night at the bar brings a surprise visit from an old acquaintance, who won't let the relationship be forgotten. In the second, a walk in the woods to blow off steam instead becomes a harrowing attempt to survive a strange accident.

To watch the podcast on YouTube: http://bit.ly/ChillingEntertainmentYT


Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or by using this link: http://bit.ly/ScaryStoriesPodcast


If you like the show, telling a friend about it would be amazing! You can text, email, Tweet, or send this link to a friend: http://bit.ly/ScaryStoriesPodcast



Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
